price: ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ߬ߢߌߣߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫߸ ߓߊ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
